name: Walking Simulator 2022
description:
Official Trailer: 

Why and what is this?

This is my first "videogame" which helped me understand the basics of Unity programming and game design. I've used free assets from the Unity Store, if you want more info about a specific asset, feel free to ask!

 Am I gonna do more?

I can't really tell if I'm going to have the time and resources to keep going, and make something more enjoyable. I am really getting into Game Programming so maybe a thing or two will come out after this, but can't promise anything. 

Will you come back to this game? 

No, I don't think so. Maybe I'm going to try test some new stuff and experiment in general with this, but since it's not a "official release" on a "official platform" like Steam, updating and keeping the game updated is hard for both ends.

Am I trying to make any kind of revenue with this?

No. This is just for experimenting and testing. I'm not making any money from this. 

Can I help with future developments?

If you really like this (somehow) and want to see more from me, the best thing you can do is leave a comment down below cheering me up, and subscribe if you want to. Thanks for watching and (hopefully) playing!

MOSTRA MENO
